digraph G { 
q0 -> q1 [label= "Comilla simple/doble" ]; 
q1 -> q1 [label = "s"]; 
q1 -> q1 [label = "e"]; 
q1 -> q1 [label = "s"]; 
q1 -> q1 [label = "s"]; 
q1 -> q1 [label = "i"]; 
q1 -> q1 [label = "o"]; 
q1 -> q1 [label = "n"]; 
q1 -> q1 [label = "-"]; 
q1 -> q1 [label = "u"]; 
q1 -> q1 [label = "s"]; 
q1 -> q1 [label = "e"]; 
q1 -> q1 [label = "r"]; 
q1 -> q2 [label= "Comilla simple/doble" ]; 
q2[peripheries=2] 
}
